summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 3, Fauntlee Hills Addition Division No. 1, as established by Ordinance No. 80469, being the alley in the block bounded by West Director Street, West Barton Street, West Henderson Street and 40th Avenue Southwest and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 16734 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
